model_answer: The instructor apologizes for an interruption from his cat in the time segment [00:02:23 - 00:03:08].

The correct answer is C: [00:06:51 - 00:07:16]. 

In the video, the instructor explains that after creating a new class in Qt Designer, they will add a push button to the form. Then, they will use the graphical connection dialog to connect the push button's clicked signal to the MainWindow's close function. This means when the user clicks on the push button, it will cause the MainWindow to close. After connecting the signals, the instructor changes the button text to "Close".
